polygon.style: stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 3; stroke-dasharray: ; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(196,239,247); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(149,171,237); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(255,255,68); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(227,146,146); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

text.style: stroke: none; stroke-width: 0; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(0,0,0); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

tspan.style: font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif; font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: underline;

polygon.style: stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 8; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(0,0,0); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 8; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(0,0,0); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;
